scripts.build:crdt: cd crdt && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.restart:server: cd server && pm2 stop all && pm2 delete all && pm2 start 'npm run build && npm run start' && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run build:crdt && npm run build:client && npm run clear-mongo && npm run restart:server
scripts.deploy:server: npm run clear-mongo && npm run restart:server && pm2 flush all
